text: Beginning on January 1, 2011, and every 6 months thereafter, the Mayor shall provide the following information, delineated by month, to the Council, the:

sections.text: Number of households participating in the District's cash assistance TANF programs;
Number of households participating in SNAP;
Number of homeless households participating in SNAP;
